data.text: “Ke azɔ la, ɖo to, o nye dɔla Yakob,
Ale Yehowa ame si wɔ wò,
elabena makɔ tsi ɖe kuɖiɖinyigba dzi
Woamie abe gbe si le gbedzi ene,
Ɖeka agblɔ be, ‘Yehowa tɔ menye.’
“Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Fia kple Ɖela,
Ekema ame kae sɔ kplim?
Migadzo nyanyanya o.
Ame siwo katã ha legbawo la,
Ame kae kpa aklamakpakpɛ mawo,
Woado ŋukpe aklamakpakpɛwɔla
Gbede tsɔ eƒe dɔwɔnu de gayibɔdzo me.
Atikpala tsɔ nudzidzenu,
Atikpala la lã sedati,
Ame la tsɔe wɔ nakee.
Etsɔ ati la ƒe afã do dzoe heɖa nu le edzi.
Etsɔ ati la ƒe mamlɛa wɔ aklamakpakpɛ,
Ame siawo menya naneke o.
Nunya mele wo dometɔ aɖeke si wòagblɔ be,
Etsɔ eƒe susu da ɖe dzofi dzi,
“Ɖo ŋku nu siawo dzi, O! Yakob,
Mekplɔ wò vodadawo dzoe abe lilikpo ene,
O! Dziƒowo, midzi ha kple dzidzɔ,
“Ale Yehowa,
Nyee gblẽa alakpanyagblɔɖilawo ƒe dzesiwo me,
Ame si wɔna ɖe eƒe dɔlawo ƒe biabiawo dzi,
Ame si gblɔ na tɔ goglowo be,
Ame si gblɔ le fia Sirus ŋu be, ‘Eyae nye nye alẽkplɔla,
